description:
Featuring a quick deployment system with single pull assembly, the Speed Tech Probes have the strength and durability of aluminum, but are still relatively light to suit professional or recreational use. Extra length adds versatility.

  • Single pull SL mechanism has a lightweight cord for quick deployment
  • Polymer pull handle resists icing and can be clipped to the probe shaft or a carabiner
  • Coated stainless steel cable for durability
  • Speed bullet ferrules provide smooth and rapid assembly of probe sections
name: G3 Speed TECH 280 Probe
